about_the_game:
Have you always wanted to take a peek behind the development curtain of Renowned Explorers? This art book contains as many adventures as Renowned Explorers does, maybe even a couple more! Next to concept art, sketches and fully rendered marketing art, it contains a lot of background information and short pieces of written context, provided by the developers. So whether you want to know everything there is to know about how Renowned Explorers was created or just want to browse through the pretty scenery of the game without having to boot it up: this is for you!

  • Size: 120 pages.
  • Format: PDF.
  • Orientation: landscape


LOCATION
Please note that the PDF files will be placed in the following location:
...\Steam\steamapps\common\Renowned Explorers\artbook\
